cases.case_citation: R (AAA (Syria) & ors) v Secretary of State for the Home Department [2023] UKSC 42
cases.strategic_issue: Safety of Rwanda, third country removals; non-refoulement; systemic risks
cases.key_holding: Unanimously held the Rwanda policy unlawful due to real risk of refoulement and deficiencies in asylum system; catalysed parliamentary push for 'Safety of Rwanda' legislation.

cases.case_citation: N.S. v SSHD; M.E. and Others v Refugee Applications Commissioner (Joined Cases C-411/10 & C-493/10)
cases.strategic_issue: Dublin transfers; systemic deficiencies test; suspending transfers
cases.key_holding: Member States must not transfer an asylum seeker where systemic deficiencies in the receiving State create a real risk of inhuman/degrading treatment.

cases.case_citation: Hirsi Jamaa and Others v Italy (GC), App No 27765/09
cases.strategic_issue: High-seas pushbacks; extraterritorial jurisdiction; collective expulsion
cases.key_holding: Italy violated Articles 3 & 4 Prot. 4 by intercepting and returning migrants to Libya; affirmed non-refoulement applies on high seas.

cases.case_citation: M.S.S. v Belgium and Greece (GC), App No 30696/09
cases.strategic_issue: Dublin transfer to Greece; reception & detention conditions; effective remedy
cases.key_holding: Violations of Articles 3 and 13 due to conditions and procedural deficiencies; landmark on reception standards and transfer suspensions.

cases.case_citation: Innovation Law Lab v Wolf, 951 F.3d 1073 (9th Cir. 2020)
cases.court: US Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
cases.strategic_issue: 'Remain in Mexico' (MPP) policy; statutory authority; refoulement risk
cases.key_holding: Preliminary injunction against MPP affirmed (later subject to stays/changes); key vehicle for challenging border externalisation.

cases.case_citation: East Bay Sanctuary Covenant v Biden, No. 23-16032 (9th Cir. 2024)
cases.court: US Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
cases.strategic_issue: Executive limits on asylum eligibility; APA challenges; statutory consistency
cases.key_holding: Ongoing appellate litigation; district court enjoined rule then stayed; central vehicle to contest transit/entry restrictions.

cases.case_citation: Sale v Haitian Centers Council, 509 U.S. 155 (1993)
cases.strategic_issue: High-seas interdiction; scope of non-refoulement under INA & Refugee Convention
cases.key_holding: Held non-refoulement in INA/Art 33 did not constrain high-seas repatriations; adverse precedent often distinguished or challenged in advocacy.

cases.case_citation: Singh v Minister of Employment and Immigration, [1985] 1 SCR 177
cases.strategic_issue: Charter s.7 & s.2(e) 'everyone' includes asylum seekers; oral hearing rights
cases.key_holding: Charter protections apply to all physically present; refugees entitled to fundamental justice incl. oral hearing.

cases.case_citation: Ruta v Minister of Home Affairs [2018] ZACC 52
cases.strategic_issue: Right to apply for asylum; delays; non-refoulement; primacy of Refugees Act
cases.key_holding: Confirmed right to apply for asylum despite delay/criminal conviction; Refugees Act read with non-refoulement governs over deportation.

cases.case_citation: Lawyers for Human Rights v Minister of Home Affairs [2017] ZACC 22
cases.key_holding: Sections authorising prolonged detention without prompt judicial review unconstitutional; strengthened safeguards for non-nationals.

cases.case_citation: Ilias and Ahmed v Hungary (GC), App No 47287/15 (2019)
cases.strategic_issue: Transit-zone confinement; removal to Serbia; procedural safeguards
cases.key_holding: Found violations linked to inadequate assessment of risk on return to Serbia; guidance on Article 3/13 standards in border zones.

cases.case_citation: Plaintiff M70/2011 v Minister for Immigration ('Malaysia Solution')
cases.strategic_issue: Offshore transfer to non-signatory 'safe country'; statutory preconditions
cases.key_holding: Malaysia arrangement invalid; strict criteria for designating 'safe' third countries for transfers.

campaigns.notable_tactics: Branding (orange heart), grassroots mobilisation, research briefs
campaigns.outcome_status: Active; provided research countering government claims and mobilised opposition to Rwanda plan

campaigns.goals: Right to work for asylum seekers after 6 months; remove job list limits
campaigns.notable_tactics: Evidence-based reports; parliamentary advocacy; coalition building
campaigns.outcome_status: Active; sustained cross-sector pressure; policy debate ongoing

campaigns.goals: End family separation and detention; reunify families; humane asylum policies
campaigns.notable_tactics: National day of protest; litigation support; fundraising for legal aid
campaigns.outcome_status: Helped end 'zero-tolerance' family separation as a formal policy; continuing oversight and advocacy

campaigns.notable_tactics: Policy platforms; rapid response statements; federal advocacy
campaigns.outcome_status: Active; central civil society coordination hub on U.S. asylum policy

campaigns.goals: End or suspend STCA with the U.S.; ensure access to asylum at the border

campaigns.outcome_status: Active; renewed calls in 2025 following policy shifts
